text: Robert George Vincent (born 23 November 1962) is an English former professional footballer who played as a forward for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:People from Newcastle upon Tyne Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Leyton Orient F.C. players Category:Whitley Bay F.C. players Category:Barrow A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Rob Vincent (footballer, born 1962)
